alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Erie; Huron; Richland; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 11:15PM EDT until August 24 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Richland County in north central Ohio... Huron County in north central Ohio... Eastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Northern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 1115 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sandusky to 7 miles west of Savannah, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Sandusky, Ashland, Norwalk, Shelby, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Ontario, New London, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan, Castalia, Savannah, Polk, Greenwich, Monroeville, Attica and Bay View. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Erie; Huron; Richland; Sandusky; Seneca
